ModMetaData.name: EBSG - Passion Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Expanded Biotech Style Genes(EBSG) is the step beyond [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2985153870]More Biotech Style Genes[/url]. Where that series sought to expand ranges that already exist, this series seeks to add ranges that should exist. You get gene ranges that alter sleep fall rate, but why not a range for changing the rate it recovers? If you can have fire resistance genes, why not have genes to resist other types of damage like frostbite and acid?
This mod adds a new category of aptitude genes called passion genes. These 36 genes increase various skill passions the pawn has. I name good.
These genes take effect after the normal passion genes, meaning you can make pawns with terrible shooting but a major passion for it, or pawns with amazing building but no passion for it.
I don't know how this interacts with Vanilla Skills Expanded, so please exercise caution if you use that mod. Depending on how that mod adds new passions, this could automatically include those in the +1/+2 list, be completely ignored, or explode.
Included in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3020821838]Expanded Biotech Style Genes - All in One[/url].
